dmca.title: Photographer broken-hearted over image copying
dmca.body:
Website: http://franklludwig.com
Email: [private]@franklludwig.com


NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT


Dear Sirs and Madams,

I wish to file a notice of copyright infringement with you.

1.I am the exclusive copyright owner of all images located in the folder http://franklludwig.com/catalogue/.

Searching the internet with Google Image Search for "Broken Heart", I found that the URL http://chickchat.ivillage.com/love/The_broken_heart.jpg had replaced the location of the original image, http://franklludwiq.com/catalogue/Broken%20Hearto.jpg (previously http://franklludwiq.com/catalogue/Broken%20Heart.jpg), displayed on my photography page at http://franklludwig.com/artphotographs.html.

Since the image at http://chickchat.ivillage.com/love/The_broken_heart.jpg is an unauthorised copy of my photograph, please immediately remove or disable all access to the infringing material.

2.My email address is [private@franklludwig.com.

3.According to Whois, the owner of the domain is

General Electric Company
Internet Registrations
[private]
Fairfield, CT 06828-0001
US
[private]@ge.com

4.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5.I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sligo, 15/01/07

[private]
